reuters.title: KRELITZ INDUSTRIES INC <KRLZ> 3RD QTR NET
reuters.body:
Period ended Jan 31 Shr seven cts vs 14 cts Net 136,000 vs 274,000 Sales 48.4 mln vs 38.2 mln Nine mths
Shr 30 cts vs 17 cts Net 573,000 vs 328,000 Sales 140.0 mln vs 102.4 mln NOTE: Prior year period ended Sept 30 Comparable periods reflect change in fiscal yearend to April from December Reuter 
